attributes.action: Make air con in london buses a legal requirement
attributes.additional_details: Tfl is not holding them to account and bus drivers and passengers are suffering, if its a passenger transport requirement then buses will not leave the garage without aircon
attributes.background: As a bus driver the cab can get upto 40° hot, but bus companies are not mantaining the air conditioning despite all buses being enabled

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

We could accept a petition calling for new requirements to be introduced for all buses in England, if that's something you want to happen.
